content.description: Stand start about 5 feet left of the problem Arrested Development with a high small flat edge and a lower right hand on anything you can hold. Dyno to the peak and top out.
content.location: From the parking lot, take your first right on the trail, and go 1-2 minute and this boulder is on the right side of the trail.

content.description: Stand start about 2 feet left of a big tree on the steep side of the boulder with two slopers. Move up and make a hard, slopey topout.
content.location: From the parking lot, walk 1 minute and take a right. Go another 1-2 minutes to a fork in the trail, and the boulder will be on your right a foot back from the trail.

content.description: Really low sit start on the right arete that faces the trail. Use a low left hand on anything you can grip and your right hand on a crimpy side pull low on the arête. Using crap feet, pull up and hit a crimpy left hand sideupll and then move up and slightly left to top out.
content.location: From the parking lot and gate, walk about two minutes down the trail and take a right at the fork and go about a minute or so to find this block on the right side of the trail.

content.description: This is a good block with three current problems.
